data.eml:eml: Two new species of Medeventor Wheeler from South America (Diptera, Chloropidae, Oscinellinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bazyar, Zeinab, Silva, Vera Cristina (2018): Two new species of Medeventor Wheeler from South America (Diptera, Chloropidae, Oscinellinae). Zootaxa 4407 (4): 563-572, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4407.4.8
